termsConditions.title: Terms & Conditions
termsConditions.content: I/We hereby provide my/our consent in accordance with Aadhaar Act 2016 and regulations made thereunder for collecting, storing and it's usage for validating/authenticating and updating my/our Aadhaar Number in accordance with the Aadhaar Act 2016 (and regulations made thereunder) and PMLA. I/We hereby provide my/our consent for sharing/disclosing my Aadhaar number.

offlineKYC.title: Offline KYC Process
offlineKYC.description1: 1. On the UDAI portal enter aahaar no. and set code
offlineKYC.description2: 2. Then enter the OTP and download the XML file.
offlineKYC.description3: 3. Upload XML file and share code on our portal
offlineKYC.description4: 4. Share original details with us for verification

questionPage1.title: Monthly Income of your Family
questionPage1.helpText: For Married Applicant   : Family income is the combined monthly income(Basic +DA) of Husband and Wife
questionPage1.helpText1: For Unmarried Applicant : Family income is the Monthly income of applicant
questionPage1.exampleText: Example : Rajesh earns ₹ 5,000 per month and his wife Shalini Earns ₹ 12,000 per month Hence, Family Income of Rajesh will be 5,000 + 12,000 = ₹ 17,000 per month
